column4: i have problem in network printing. printer does not print anything. the ipp is ipp://192.168.1.2/printers/HP_Deskjet_5740. i even added a rule to the firewall to allow connections from 192.168.0.0/255.255.0.0. what should i do?
anyone help me? i tryed  telnet 192.168.1.2 631 but connection is refused. dont understand it.
can you log in to 192.168.1.2 from the actual terminal? it sounds like either sshd is off or your ip isn't in the /etc/hosts.allow
